title: A Flavour of German - Lesson 01
description: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 01 you will learn some useful phrases to talk about the weather. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
content:encoded: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 01 you will learn some useful phrases to talk about the weather. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
itunes:subtitle: Use idiomatic German to talk about the weather
